page.title: Bedones Moderator
page.subtitle: Manage your Facebook comments with artificial intelligence

undesiredComments.title: Filter Undesired Comments
undesiredComments.description: When enabled, this feature allows you to automatically handle comments that contain unwanted content, inappropriate language, or violate your community guidelines. You can choose to either hide these comments from public view or delete them entirely.

spamDetection.title: Detect and Handle Spam
spamDetection.description: Our AI-powered spam detection automatically identifies promotional content, repetitive messages, suspicious links, and other spam patterns. Choose how you want these comments to be handled.

intelligentFAQ.title: Intelligent Generated Replies
intelligentFAQ.description: Set up automated intelligent responses for frequently asked questions. Define assertions that trigger specific AI-generated responses to provide consistent, helpful answers to your audience.
intelligentFAQ.configureDescription: Configure an intelligent response for frequently asked questions.
intelligentFAQ.assertionPlaceholder: Ex: If the user asks for the phone number
intelligentFAQ.assertionMin: Assertion must be at least 3 characters
intelligentFAQ.responseMin: Response must be at least 3 characters

facebook.disclaimer: By continuing, you accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

validation.atLeastOneFeature: Please enable at least one moderation feature

authError.title: Authentication Error
authError.message: We encountered an issue while processing your request. Please try again or contact the application owner if the problem persists.
authError.helpIntro: If you continue to experience issues:

helpSteps.clearCache: Clear your browser cache and cookies
helpSteps.contactSupport: Contact support if the problem persists

please_restart_the_process.title: Session Expired
please_restart_the_process.message: Your authentication session has expired. Please restart the login process.

access_denied.title: Access Denied
access_denied.message: You denied access to your account. Please try again and grant the necessary permissions.

oauth_error.title: OAuth Error
oauth_error.message: There was an error connecting to the authentication provider. Please try again.

configuration_error.title: Configuration Error
configuration_error.message: There is a configuration issue. Please contact support.

unable_to_create_user.title: Unable to Create Account
unable_to_create_user.message: We were unable to create your account. This may be due to a technical issue. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
